abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger reviews book America's Bitter Pill: Money, Politics, Backroom Deals, and the Fight to Fix Our Broken Healthcare System by Steven Brill.
lead_paragraph: Steven Brill has written a comprehensive chronicle of the politicking behind the Affordable Care Act, spiced by personal insights stemming from his own surgery.
snippet: Steven Brill has written a comprehensive chronicle of the politicking behind the Affordable Care Act, spiced by personal insights stemming from his own surgery.
